mapper.select: select orders.order_no, details.tracking_no from (select id as order_no from wphpm_posts where post_type = 'shop_order' and post_status = 'wc-shipped' and post_date between #{start_dtime} and #{end_dtime} ) as orders inner join (select post_id as order_no, meta_value as tracking_no from wphpm_postmeta where meta_key = '_aftership_tracking_number' group by post_id having max(meta_id)) as details on orders.order_no = details.order_no inner join (select order_no, tracking_no, date from kr_a_wh_out where status = 2 and date between #{start_dtime} and #{end_dtime} ) as out_orders on orders.order_no = out_orders.order_no left join (select order_no, tracking_no from kr_a_wh_delivered where create_dtime between #{start_dtime} and #{end_dtime} ) as delivered_orders on out_orders.order_no = delivered_orders.order_no and out_orders.tracking_no = delivered_orders.tracking_no left join (select order_no, tracking_no from kr_a_wh_shipment_error where create_dtime between #{start_dtime} and #{end_dtime}) as issue_orders on out_orders.order_no = issue_orders.order_no and out_orders.tracking_no = issue_orders.tracking_no limit 120;
mapper.insert: insert into kr_a_wh_delivered (order_no, tracking_no, event, event_code, ship_dtime, delivered_dtime) values #{param};
insert into kr_a_wh_shipment_error (order_no, tracking_no, event, event_code, occurred_dtime) values #{param};
